summary: This is an email chain from September 2021 regarding a discovery request from the FBI Victim Services Division to a Victim Specialist in the Jeffrey Epstein/Ghislaine Maxwell investigation. The request seeks contact information for victims, witnesses, and their attorneys to be provided to the USAO for the upcoming trial scheduled for November 29, 2021.

persons.name: Gloria Allred
persons.context: Mentioned as the attorney whose executive assistant is referenced in the discovery request for victim/witness communications.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Subject of the New York investigation (50D-NY-3027571) scheduled for trial on November 29, 2021.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the New York investigation (50D-NY-3027571) scheduled for trial on November 29, 2021.

connections.description: Both are named as subjects of the same New York investigation (50D-NY-3027571) and are scheduled for trial together.

events.title: Epstein/Maxwell Trial Date
events.description: The New York investigation of Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell is scheduled for trial.

events.title: Discovery Request Issued
events.description: The FBI Victim Services Division issues a request for contact information of victims, witnesses, and attorneys involved in the Epstein/Maxwell case for criminal discovery purposes.

events.title: Response to Discovery Request
events.description: A Victim Specialist responds to the discovery request, confirming they provided services to a victim via cell phone and in person.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division was actively gathering contact information for victims, witnesses, and their attorneys for the Epstein/Maxwell trial as of September 2021.
The trial for the New York investigation (case 50D-NY-3027571) of Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell was scheduled for November 29, 2021.
A Victim Specialist from the Lake Havasu City/Yuma area confirmed providing services to a victim both via cell phone and in person.
The discovery request explicitly states that all communications with victims, witnesses, or victim's attorneys would be turned over to the USAO (U.S. Attorney's Office).
Attorney Gloria Allred is indirectly referenced via her executive assistant, suggesting her potential involvement in representing parties in the case.
